title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 377.5 - Department action
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 377.5 - Department action

State Regulations

The department shall act upon all permit applications
within the time periods set forth in Parts 621 and 624 of this Title. If the
board denies the certificate before the department takes action on any permit
application(s), all such permit applications shall be deemed
denied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
377.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
